achievements: Served as Acting Director of the FBI in 2017
Played a key role in investigations into Russian interference in the 2016 US election
Known for his darkly comedic and satirical novels such as 'The Butcher Boy'
Won the GPA Book Award for 'The Dead School'
Notable roles in British theatre and television
Appeared in films like 'The Constant Gardener' and 'Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides'
